:: DESCRIPTION ::
The Shining is a 1977 horror novel by American author Stephen King. The title was inspired by the John Lennon song "Instant Karma!", which contained the line "We all shine onÃ¢â‚¬Â¦". It was King's third published novel, and first hardback bestseller, and the success of the book firmly established King as a preeminent author in the horror genre. A film based upon the book, The Shining directed by Stanley Kubrick, was released in 1980. The book was later adapted into a television mini-series in 1997. In October 2013, a limited edition of The Shining signed by Stephen King will be published by Subterranean Press.

The book is dedicated to King's son, Joseph: "This is for Joe Hill King, who shines on."
